artist: Delineator: After Antoine Boizot; Engraver: Étienne Fessard; Publisher: Michel Odieuvre
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image below oval and on pedestal in black: ABoizot del.  Et. Fessard scul / LOUIS III ET CARLOMAN / XXVII Roy de France / Louis mort en 880. Carloman / en 884. apres 5 ans de régne | below image in black: AParis chez Odieuvre m'd d'estampes quai de lEcole vis-a-vis la Samaritaine a la Belle Image C.P.R. | on sheet in pencil: 1-404
title: Portrait of Louis III and Charles XXVII, Kings of France
